Name: Tejasvi
Review:
Sound quality not good


Sound quality bilkul acha ni tha. Sound pura fat jata h jb full volume hoti hai. N mujh zyada sound expected ta utta mila nahi. Or kabi kabi apne ap hi bich me ruk jata hai. Fr chlta h ajib sa hi ho raha hai.  1 2 sec k liye apne ap volume low ho jati hai fr nrml chlta hai. Ye product mujh warranty k sth mila h. Meri kch help ho sakti hai kya is product ko le k. Like mujh iski jgha dusra chahiye bt me late ho gyi return reqst dalne me. So can u help me in this?
